title: Technology Education Design for Urban Youth: Applying Activity-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of technical education and familiarity with instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Training program for pre-service teachers to design education considering urban youth's cultural backgrounds and technology-based learning motivation, strengthening scenario-applicable design competencies through activity-based online learning

learning_goals: Learners can analyze technological learning barriers among urban youth and propose three or more educational design strategies to overcome them
Learners can design technology education modules and implement them on an LMS by applying activity-based learning principles
Learners can develop culturally contextualized assessment tools to enhance learner engagement

resources: Virtual simulation tool for technology education manipulatives

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
